blog.name: ao3feed-wolfstar
blog.title: remus x sirius ao3 feed
blog.description: (I don't actually read all these fics or choose what comes on the blog, it's literally just a feed of the ao3 ship tag sorry)

title: 4:13 AM.
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ru8tQm

by Pit-A-Pat (PetitPink)

9:02 AM. Remus is the first to stir when the alarm rings. Sirius is still well asleep, apparently unaware of the shrill beeping. Remus reaches out for the clock, not bothering to turn the alarm off, and places it near Sirius’s ears. When Sirius lets out a small groan of protest, pulling up the blanket to cover his entire face, Remus prods him in the stomach. Sirius groans again. Remus shakes him. Sirius groans even more. And so it goes.

Words: 1414, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, James Potter, Lily Evans Potter
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin
  • Additional Tags: Fluff, Angst, Fluff and Angst, wolfstar, Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Marauders


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ru8tQm

blog.name: lilietsblog
blog.title: Aremo Shitai Koremo Shitai Onna no Ko ni Mietatte
blog.description:
My new webcomics masterist!
I'm Ukrainian, but since I spend a lot of time in English-speaking section of internet, a lot of my thoughts and rants end up in English, so I have an English-speaking blog.
Also, the reason I have this blog is Homestuck which is an awesome thing.
My hero title seems to be Mage of Light; either that or Maid of Light; I'm not really sure.

Not entirely cis, mostly female, aro ace (aromantic asexual). You are welcome to address me as Liliet, she/her or they/them.

summary:

Snape: I have this headache that comes and goes. 
MC: *walks into the classroom*
Snape: oh look...

summary: General Welcome Post
title: General Welcome Post
body:
Hi all!

This is going to be a blog that features some of my favourite fanfiction stories because I really want to share them with people! This is decidedly going to be multifandom so there’s plenty of room for everyone!

If you read any of my recs I encourage you to leave a comment for the author and also come talk to me about them if you’d like!!

All recs will include a link to the original posting of the story that I found - if these are broken or incorrect, let me know!

Happy reading!

summary: 'Darling Dodgy! I remember interviewing him a few years back about merpeople rights, bless him. Completely gaga, seemed to think...
body:
‘Darling Dodgy! I remember interviewing him a few years back about merpeople rights, bless him. Completely gaga, seemed to think we were sitting at the bottom of Lake Windermere, kept telling me to watch out for trout.’

Rita Skeeter, HPatDH

I’m rereading Deathly Hallows and thinking about how Skeeter is using Doge’s role as an activist for a minority group as a way to discredit him

blog.name: uniqueficrecs
blog.title: Not Your Average Fic
blog.description:
Screw regular fic recs. You want something different, I want something different. So here's something different! 
Fandoms include (but not limited to): BTS, Harry Potter, Marvel, Naruto, and much more.

summary: Harry Potter - Crackish AU! - Seer! Harry
title: Harry Potter - Crackish AU! - Seer! Harry
body:
Some stories I just can’t explain simply either because the AU is so big, the plot is so intense, or there are twists I don’t want to ruin. This is all of those reasons, but I’ll try. This story just really hits all the goals.

- 

Teaching History (is Old News) by You_Light_The_Sky (Alternate Universe, Rare Pairing?, Drabbles, Plot Heavy, World Building, Slow Burn, Psychological, Comedy, Twist) 

In which Tom is the DADA professor at Hogwarts, secretly recruiting followers for his future army, and Harry is the worst Divination professor ever, accidentally messing up Tom’s plans.

-

Review: Just to clarify, the AU is one that merges the timelines. People like Harry, Tom, Cho, and Diggory went to school together and teach at Hogwarts, while others remain students. Also, the story starts off as drabbles before it dives into an actually deep plot. Tom Riddle got his dream job as a DADA professor and is still on his way to becoming a dark lord and never could stand Harry. Meanwhile, Harry Potter is a Seer who, because of his constant visions of different possible realities, is a few screws loose and so nobody actually believes he’s a seer. It’s light and funny up until Tom realized that Harry might actually be serious about his visions, then the story turns into the most intense mystery with the biggest revelation ever. Some of the best stories are a mix of actual plot and total crack. There is romance between Tom and Harry, but really what gets you is the plot aspect. It’s like the story is teasing you and giving pieces of what is actually an intense reality. Warning though, the author updates at their leisure.

Message me if you find any stories similar or recommend any Seer! fics

Review: Just to clarify, the AU is one that merges the timelines. People like Harry, Tom, Cho, and Diggory went to school together and teach at Hogwarts, while others remain students. Also, the story starts off as drabbles before it dives into an actually deep plot. Tom Riddle got his dream job as a DADA professor and is still on his way to becoming a dark lord and never could stand Harry. Meanwhile, Harry Potter is a Seer who, because of his constant visions of different possible realities, is a few screws loose and so nobody actually believes he’s a seer. It’s light and funny up until Tom realized that Harry might actually be serious about his visions, then the story turns into the most intense mystery with the biggest revelation ever. Some of the best stories are a mix of actual plot and total crack. There is romance between Tom and Harry, but really what gets you is the plot aspect. It’s like the story is teasing you and giving pieces of what is actually an intense reality. Warning though, the author updates at their leisure.

Message me if you find any stories similar or recommend any Seer! fics
trail.content:
Some stories I just can’t explain simply either because the AU is so big, the plot is so intense, or there are twists I don’t want to ruin. This is all of those reasons, but I’ll try. This story just really hits all the goals.

- 

Teaching History (is Old News) by You_Light_The_Sky (Alternate Universe, Rare Pairing?, Drabbles, Plot Heavy, World Building, Slow Burn, Psychological, Comedy, Twist) 

In which Tom is the DADA professor at Hogwarts, secretly recruiting followers for his future army, and Harry is the worst Divination professor ever, accidentally messing up Tom’s plans.

-

Also, the story starts off as drabbles before it dives into an actually deep plot. Tom Riddle got his dream job as a DADA professor and is still on his way to becoming a dark lord and never could stand Harry. Meanwhile, Harry Potter is a Seer who, because of his constant visions of different possible realities, is a few screws loose and so nobody actually believes he’s a seer. It’s light and funny up until Tom realized that Harry might actually be serious about his visions, then the story turns into the most intense mystery with the biggest revelation ever. Some of the best stories are a mix of actual plot and total crack. There is romance between Tom and Harry, but really what gets you is the plot aspect. It’s like the story is teasing you and giving pieces of what is actually an intense reality. Warning though, the author updates at their leisure.
